tool_description: Creates concise executive summaries from full document content, highlighting key points, recommendations, and critical information for senior stakeholders.

summary_length.description: Desired summary length: brief, standard, or detailed

focus_areas.description: Specific areas to emphasize in summary

error_messages: Empty document content: Provide full document for summary generation
Invalid summary length: Use one of [brief, standard, detailed]
Document too short: Minimum content length required for meaningful summary
Document too long: Maximum content length exceeded for summary processing
usage: Provide full_document and summary_length to generate executive summary. Specify focus_areas and toggle financial/recommendation highlights as needed.

key_points.description: Extracted key points from the document

compression_ratio.description: Ratio of summary length to original document length
